Summary: Very Active day and evening over CASS county
divs: sighting detailsaug 20th 2008 to start this report off , i must say it consists of the entire evening of sightings. starting at about 5 pm and lasting until around 10 pm when i had to go to work. me a friend and my kids where sitting outside just talking, then we hear a jet , so we start looking for it, but we seen nothing of the sorts instead we saw a small whitish colored sphere and it went up into the clouds. shortly after what seemed to b f 16's started flying through, again hearing the jet sounds. not to long after we went on about what we were doing, outdoors still. my 14 yr old daughter saw a huge helicopter, she yelled at to look, but she describes it as being huge, and flying fast. but we didnt even hear it, if it was that close i thought we should have heard it. she described it as being drk in color brown\ black . i thought it was odd. and that was just the beginning of our night of sightings. the rest of the evening fighter jets kept making rounds. in pairs of 2 and 3.. after the activity started up again, i went in and got my video recorder, and started recording every craft. that came close.. one craft i recorded close to 10 pm was a very large triangle shaped craft, i believe it to be a possible stealth craft of some sorts as it was very low flying. and make absolutely no sound.. i have a very good video of this. it had first 2 lights on each side and 1 flashing and one strobe , as it got directly over head of us the flashing light became solid so that it appeared triangular. and the strobe continued.. it was a very very active night here. wow i will have my camera from now on every where i go! i swear
